TopicTitle: Do we get access to the debug menu or something similar that we saw in the ESA videos today? Spoiler for picture. I need KSP1 cheats for easy testing.

Articles.Content:
Spoiler

Do we get something like this in the non debug build?

I need to do some testing at other planets which I don't want to have to fly/launch to every time to get there.

Basically I need all the cheats from KSP1 to test KSP2 efficiently.
